data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Lagos, Nigeria honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lagos, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Lagos, Nigeria so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Lagos, Nigeria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 10,601,300 people living in Lagos, Nigeria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kadun people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lagos with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,731,149 believers in Lagos to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 7,870,150 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lagos, Nigeria has a population of 10,601,300.

We estimate Lagos has 2,731,149 people who might know Jesus, 2,697,755 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,172,395 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,731,149 believers in the state of Lagos the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Lagos
